> <OLD>
>
> Tucson remains right beside Talon and settles in for a rest himself,
> returning to beast mode, and curling up in a ball at her bedside.  His eyes
> close, heavy with exhaustion. It's not long before he too is sleeping
> soundly.  Yet his vigil is clear as his long tail coils around the bed.  But
> now it was time for rest.  And rest he was getting.

<NEW>

And so that ARK settled down into a comforting routine. Lights in
unused rooms began to shut down, including the medical bay and things
begin to go quiet.

NIGHTSHIFT and QUICKSTRIDE receive messages from LEGACY, "Report to
the secondary docking bay."

(TAG)

- Preston
